alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:56PM MDT until July 25 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Central Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 455 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Thurman to 3 miles northwest of Kutch, or along a line extending from 14 miles northwest of Flagler to 24 miles southwest of Limon, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Punkin Center around 515 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
